title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Skills: AR/VR/MR-Enabled Self-Directed Learning for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: In a medical simulation environment, AR/VR/MR tools are utilized to apply patient diagnostic protocols with 80% accuracy.
Through virtual reality-based training, emergency response procedures are independently performed three or more times.
In a mixed-reality environment, medical team collaboration scenarios are completed with a success rate of 70% or higher.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
